quote: ''I will vigorously push for the passage of the FOI bill which the current administration has continuously refused to certify as urgent even if its passage was promised in the 2010 presidential campaign.''
''Yong poverty, 'di ko malaman paano may kinalaman ang dynasty. Nagkakaroon ng poverty dahil 'di tama ang pamamahala, economic reasons, pero it's not because dynasty causes poverty.''

''Kung hahayaan natin ito at hindi tayo kikilos na ma-amyendahan ang sistema ng pagbubuwis sa bansa, darating ang araw na ang tax rate ng mga guro, pulis, sundalo, at nars ay sintaas na ng tax rate ng mga milyonaryo sa bansa.''

''(H)indi dapat ipilit ang pagsasabatas ng BBL. Hindi dapat brasuhin ng Palasyo ang Kongreso. Dapat ay igalang ang Kongreso bilang co-equal branch ng gobyerno. Hindi dapat takutin, pilitin o suhulan ang kongreso para gawin ang gusto ng Palasyo.''

''I talked about bilateral relations before. Insofar as our claims on the Spratlys, that is non-negotiable. That is ours. Bilateral relations are important to improve trade and commerce. We need investments.''
''We have to revisit our Constitution, among other things... We have to get out of that 60-40 (foreign control of businesses) arrangement.''

''We will continue and improve the CCT program. But we will ensure better targeting of beneficiaries... Leakages in the program have to be addressed decisively.''

Binay did not raise his hand when asked about his position on divorce during the March 20 presidential debate in Cebu. Not raising his hand meant he was against divorce.
Binay raised his hand when asked during the March 20 presidential debate in Cebu City if he was in favor of burying the remains of former President Ferdinand Marcos

''When I become president, one of the first things we will do is to review the implementation of the K-12. I agree with the noble purpose behind K-12, but I feel that stakeholders are ill-prepared for such major adjustments in their schedules and resources. We will fine-tune the system to prepare the schools and the students to be ready for the changes.''

''Eh tama naman yong objection do'n, i-extend mo na naman, eh hindi mo naman susugan, imbis na orasan yong pag-extend, orasan natin kung pano i-sustain yong mga pangangailangan ng mga bagong nagmamayari ng lupa.''

''My presidency will be one that will heal the wounds of political and ideological differences and unite the people under one flag. We recognize the need to address the root causes of the armed conflict: poverty, inequality and injustice, he said. We will work with all organizations and sectoral groups in crafting a shared national agenda that will address these issues. This is the road to lasting peace.''

''Let me state as a lawyer that the question of accountabilities of government officials would have to be reckoned as part of the legal and logical consequences of this groundbreaking decision. As you all know, the Supreme Court [SC] has placed the onus of proving 'good faith' on those who conceived and implemented the DAP.''
